PSXDataSet.name: CommunityContent
PSXDataSet.description: Gives the details of content by community.

PSXDataSet.name: PubStatus
PSXDataSet.description: Gives the details of publishing status.

PSXDataSet.name: StaleContent
PSXDataSet.description: Gives the details of content that has not been modified for last seven days.

PSXDataSet.name: ContentStats
PSXDataSet.description: Gives the details of content state.

PSXDataSet.name: PubTimeStatistics
PSXDataSet.description: Retrieves the statistics of publishing time for all published editions. This is used for SQLServer, Oracle and DB2

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT STATUS_ID PUB_STATUS_ID, CONTENTTYPENAME CONTENT_TYPE, NAME VARIANT, STATUS STATUS, AVG(ELAPSED) AVG_TIME, MIN(ELAPSED) MIN_TIME, MAX(ELAPSED) MAX_TIME, SUM(ELAPSED) TOTAL_TIME, COUNT(*) NUM_ITEMS FROM PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC, CONTENTSTATUS, CONTENTTYPES, PSX_TEMPLATE WHERE PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.TEMPLATE_ID IS NOT NULL AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.ELAPSED IS NOT NULL AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.CONTENT_ID=CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID=CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.TEMPLATE_ID=PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID GROUP BY PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS_ID, CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPENAME, PSX_TEMPLATE.NAME, PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS

PSXDataSet.name: PubTimeStatisticsWithSpecifiedPubStatusIds
PSXDataSet.description: Retrieves the statistics of publishing time for a set of specified published status ids. This is used for SQLServer, Oracle and DB2

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT STATUS_ID PUB_STATUS_ID, CONTENTTYPENAME CONTENT_TYPE, NAME VARIANT, STATUS STATUS, AVG(ELAPSED) AVG_TIME, MIN(ELAPSED) MIN_TIME, MAX(ELAPSED) MAX_TIME, SUM(ELAPSED) TOTAL_TIME, COUNT(*) NUM_ITEMS FROM PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC, CONTENTSTATUS, CONTENTTYPES, PSX_TEMPLATE WHERE PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.TEMPLATE_ID IS NOT NULL AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.ELAPSED IS NOT NULL AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS_ID IN (:"PSXSingleParam/sys_pubstatusid") AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.CONTENT_ID=CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID=CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPEID AND PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.TEMPLATE_ID=PSX_TEMPLATE.TEMPLATE_ID GROUP BY PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS_ID, CONTENTTYPES.CONTENTTYPENAME, PSX_TEMPLATE.NAME, PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS

PSXDataSet.name: PubStatusIds
PSXDataSet.description: Gives the details of publishing status ids.

PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT DISTINCT PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC.STATUS_ID FROM PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC PSX_PUBLICATION_DOC ORDER BY STATUS_ID DESC
